forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds this morning. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 11C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds this morning. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 53F. WNW winds at less than 5 mph, increasing to 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this evening followed by increasing clouds with showers developing after midnight. Low near 5C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening will give way to occasional showers overnight. Low 42F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 11C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 53F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low near 5C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 42F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High near 10C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High around 50F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 4C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low near 40F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 11C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 53F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds overnight. Low around 5C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 41F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. High 12C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. High 54F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High around 15C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 59F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 7C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low around 45F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. High 12C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. High 54F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 8C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 46F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 14C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 57F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 8C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 47F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 14C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear skies. Low 7C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 44F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 14C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 57F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 7C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low near 45F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
